LanguageData.RGK_SimpleChair.label: Simple chair
LanguageData.RGK_SimpleChair.description: A simple platform on which to sit. Not very comfortable, but much better than nothing. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.RGK_SimpleChair_Blueprint.label: Simple chair (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_SimpleChair_Blueprint_Install.label: Simple chair (blueprint)

LanguageData.RGK_Dresser.label: Dresser
LanguageData.RGK_Dresser.description: A dresser. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.RGK_Dresser_Blueprint.label: Dresser (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_Dresser_Blueprint_Install.label: Dresser (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_Dresser_Frame.label: Dresser (building)
LanguageData.RGK_Dresser_Frame.description: A dresser. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.RGK_EndTable.label: end table
LanguageData.RGK_EndTable.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.RGK_EndTable_Blueprint.label: end table (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_EndTable_Blueprint_Install.label: end table (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_EndTable_Frame.label: end table (building)
LanguageData.RGK_EndTable_Frame.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.

LanguageData.RGK_EndTableWithLamp_Frame.label: End table (building)
LanguageData.RGK_EndTableWithLamp_Frame.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.
